1311099747927764998.text: Today, several bipartisan bills that I sponsored were debated on the House Floor and passed through a suspension of the rules. See below to learn more about these important pieces of legislation.

1311099455203139584.text: In 2016, an estimated 11% of all ER patients displayed suicidal ideation but only 3% were identified and linked with treatment. Thanks to @ENAorg for bringing this problem to my attention.

1311099453890351104.text: The Effective Screening Suicide Screening & Assessment in the Emergency Department Act creates a uniform screening tool to assess patients in the ER for suicide risk.

1311099452711673857.text: An impressive 22 therapies have been approved since the PRV’s inception in 2012. Pediatric cancer remains the #1 cause of death in American children, with thousands of children lost to cancer each year. We can do better! Thanks to @EveryLifeOrg & @KIDSvCANCER for the support!

1311099451327512576.text: The Creating Hope Reauthorization Act reauthorizes the #PriorityReviewVoucher (PRV) program for rare pediatric diseases for four more years. PRV incentivizes the development of cures for childhood cancer.

1311099450048344064.text: The STAND-UP Act has a goal to identify threats before they materialize & ensure at-risk students get the mental health treatment they need. These programs reduce bullying, suicide & campus violence. A special thanks to @SandyHookPromise Foundation for its support.
